nodes.text: The Fereallis was a TL-1200 transport owned by Captain Gideon, a Devaronian pirate and leader of the Suwanee Pirates.

Captain Gideon and his crew operated in and around Hutt Space using the Fereallis to prey on unsuspecting vessels by pretending the TL-1200 transport was damaged. The pirates would send out a distress call and wait for their "rescuers" to find the ship apparently venting atmosphere. Once the victims boarded the Fereallis to render aid, the pirates would ambush them and confiscate whatever items they deemed valuable.
